body_html:
Yeah, this BUILD file has to be updated as well:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/jemalloc.BUILD

The configurations were created by running ./configure on an Ubuntu 14.04 machine and copying it over. If you don't have access to Ubuntu, you can use Docker.

body:
Yeah, this BUILD file has to be updated as well:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/jemalloc.BUILD

The configurations were created by running ./configure on an Ubuntu 14.04 machine and copying it over. If you don't have access to Ubuntu, you can use Docker.
